ISSUE.TITLE: `github.com/docker/docker/api/types.Info` is deprecated and is removed in docker v26
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Description podman v5.0.0 uses a deprecated field in here https://github.com/containers/podman/blob/aaa6dc3cc6a670fd707e3188097207af5be4bd31/pkg/api/handlers/types.go#L77 it is removed in docker v26 ### Steps to reproduce the issue Steps to reproduce the issue 1. Upgrade to docker v26 2. Perform the build ### Describe the results you received The build fails with ``` github.com/containers/podman/v5/pkg/api/handlers /root/go/pkg/mod/github.com/containers/podman/v5@v5.0.0/pkg/api/handlers/types.go:77:9: undefined: docker.Info ``` ### Describe the results you expected Build succeeds. ### podman info output ```yaml podman v5.0.0 ``` ### Podman in a container No ### Privileged Or Rootless None ### Upstream Latest Release Yes ### Additional environment details Additional environment details ### Additional information Additional information like issue happens only occasionally or issue happens with a particular architecture or on a particular setting

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #22182 from cfergeau/vfkit-debug applehv: Print vfkit logs in --log-level debug

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix reference to deprecated types.Info upstream docker folks deprecated types.Info in favor of system.Info. fixes #22132 and #22117 Signed-off-by: Brent Baude <bbaude@redhat.com>
